content: कुरुः (<ab>pl.</ab>) {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country situated in the north of India about the site of the modern Delhi; श्रियः कुरूणामधिपस्य पालनीं <ls>Ki. 1. 1</ls>; चिराय तस्मिन् कुरवश्चकासते <ls n="Ki.">1. 17.</ls> {@--2@} The kings of this country. --रुः {@--1@} A priest. {@--2@} Boiled rice.
